content: अर्मः --र्मं [ऋ-मन् <ls>Uṇ. 1. 137</ls>] {@--1@} A disease of the eye. {@--2@} A country to which one should go (गंतव्यदेशः or चिरंतनग्रामनिवासः). {@--3@} A cemetery.
